goal.en: This course is organized by two teachers. The first part of this course is to introduce how to implement an e-business model. The seond part is to help CEOs improve their e-business model via studying some well-known strategies in the network economy.
goal.ch: 本課程由兩位老師授課.第一部分為介紹企業如何進行電子化.第二部分則介紹資訊服務業常使用的策略作為改進商業模式的建議.

content.en:
Part I.
1. e-buasee Model
2. Strategy
3. Case Study
Part II.
1. Information Rules
2. Simulation
3. Case Study
content.ch:
Part I.
1. e-buasee Model
2. Strategy
3. Case Study
Part II.
1. Information Rules
2. Simulation
3. Case Study

textbook.en: Information Rules: A Strategic Guide to the Network Economy
textbook.ch: Information Rules: A Strategic Guide to the Network Economy
